column1: Little Goat Diner////Best advice - if you don't want to wait
column2: get there before 8:45 AM Â or around 4-5 PM on a Saturday or Sunday. On one of my trips
column3: the wait was quoted as 2.5 hours for lunch (around 12 PM)
column4: but it ended up only being 1.5 hours. It was okay
column5: we went to Glazed and Infused for an appetizer. :)
